message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor to start.  We both benefit from closing the deal now.
I think 55/45 is a fairer split. It gives you a good starting point, and avoids us losing any money due to inflation.
Bob, my offer is getting worse with inflation.  Let's settle this now. I'll take a small hit and say 58/42.
